C.3 Probable Future Extensions

AWK is a language similar to PERL, only considerably more elegant.

— Arnold Robbins

Hey!

— Larry Wall

The TODO file in the master branch of the gawk Git repository lists possible future enhancements. Some of these relate to the source code, and others to possible new features. Please see that file for the list. See section Making Additions to gawk, if you are interested in tackling any of the projects listed there.
